name: Wreckoning
description:
Dodge through traffic in rocket powered cars! Race against the timer, once it reaches zero it's game over! Gain time through checkpoints, drifts, near misses and smashing traffic!

Features:
-Randomly generated track.
-7 Unlockable vehicles.
-Floating triangles.
-Did I mention rocket powered cars?

Play on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lawrenceparry.wreckoning

V1.0

  • New car selection screen.
  • Wider track.
  • Performance improvements.
  • Minor visual improvements.
  • Tweaked vehicle stats.
  • UI improvements.
  • Loading screen.
  • Bug fixes.

V0.5

  • Three new vehicles.
  • Tweaked vehicle stats.
  • Faster acceleration at low speeds.
  • Shield remains for half a second after slowing down.
  • Skinny track segments are shorter.
  • Progress and settings are saved between sessions.
  • Resolution scale setting.
  • Modified camera follow.
  • Wind effects when travelling at a high speed.
  • Countless bug fixes.

V0.4

  • Two new vehicles.
  • Eight new track pieces.
  • Improved collision.
  • Improved goal system.
  • Tweaked vehicle stats.
  • Tweaked effects.
  • Destroying traffic gives less of a boost.
  • Time bonuses decreased.

V0.3

  • Visual overhaul.
  • Music.
  • Settings menu.
  • Improved collision with edges of track.
  • Small physics tweaks on each of the vehicles.
  • Traffic can only be destroyed when going a certain speed.
  • Lots of bug fixes.

V0.2

  • End of game stats.
  • Vehicle select screen.
  • 3 Unlockable vehicles.
  • Traffic can be destroyed giving player a speed boost.
